The user concentrates all their [[Shikotsumyaku]] powers into the creation of a single bone weapon, which is made as hard as possible with a considerable amount of [[chakra]]. Because of the weapon's large size, as well as the sheer density of the compressed bone, [[Kimimaro]] must enter the second level of his [[Cursed Seal of Earth|cursed seal]] to be able to handle it. The bone weapon can be incredibly destructive, wielded as a sort of battering ram or spear. But a philosophy of the [[Kaguya clan]] is that even the deadliest weapon is useless if it can't hit its target. As such, Dance of the Clematis: Flower is first preceded by [[Dance of the Clematis: Vine]], which is used to immobilise targets.<ref name="d2"/> Despite its strength, this technique was unable to break through [[Ultimately Hard Absolute Defence: Shield of Shukaku]], against which it shattered into pieces.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 217</ref>

== Trivia ==
*''[[Wikipedia:Clematis florida|Clematis florida]]'' is of the genus [[wikipedia:clematis|clematis]]. It's a perennial ivy that grows flowers coloured white or deep purple.<ref>''[[Tō no Sho]]'', page 207</ref>
